product_name: Natural High Country Beef Stew with Mashed Potatoes - 2 Servings
long_description: A hearty bowl of Natural High Country Beef Stew with Mashed Potatoes is just what you need to refuel after a big day in the mountains. Easy to prepare in its own foil pouch; just add boiling water and stir, let stand for 12 - 15 min., and then serve. Prepare the stew separate from the mashed potatoes then serve together. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: A hearty bowl of Natural High Country Beef Stew with Mashed Potatoes is just what you need to refuel after a big day in the mountains.
